Planning for complex designs is tough! Interactions can often be smaller than simple effects, and uncertainty for interactions is generally higher than for simple effects.

One useful tool to explore is <https://intxpower.com/>. The website and lots of useful information about planning for complex designs is described by the creators in this paper: [@sommet2023].
